channel.title: [pi] Making non wild , Wild [pi]
channel.description:
How do i make it where non wild is wild or pvp. I want to make a few places wild to pk where its 10wild.
Places: Bandit camp Al kaid Ardy Fally Lumby Yanille
I want to make those towns 10 wild so e.g if your a lvl 3 you can attack 3-13 and if your 126 you can attack 116-126 and if your 90 you can attack 80-100. So you get what i mean but servers have it pvp where says lvl it can attack i can probly do that but i mainly what the wild. So if somone can give me the boolean or code ect ill code the rest of it, or you can give me a link to a guide ty.
